title: Topic 001 Question 003
body: You have a Microsoft 365 tenant that uses the domain named fabrikam.com. The Guest invite settings for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) are configured as shown in the exhibit. (Click the Exhibit tab.)
A user named bsmith@fabrikam.com shares a Microsoft SharePoint Online document library to the users shown in the following table.
Which users will be emailed a passcode?
